item.title: Stream Control Transmission Protocol (SCTP)
item.description: 1 SCTP Associations 2 Using Multiple Interfaces 3 Streams 4 Association ID 5 Rec & Send 6 CDB with SCTP? 7 SCTP Interface Model 7.1 two types of SCTP sockets 7.2 The One-to-One Style 7.3 The One-to-Many Style 本文为摘录，原文为： https://www.linuxjournal.com/article/9749 1 SCTP Associations SCTP 的联合 (association) 类似于 TCP 的连接 (connection) ， 但又有不
